templates.all_templates_description: Please note that you can still customize the button to your own wishes after inserting it

warnings.invalid_phone_number: Invalid phone number. Please only use number for your phone number. Omit any zeros, brackets or dashes when adding the phone number in international format.

premium_license_free_version.title: License activated
premium_license_free_version.information: Please download and upload the premium version found in the email we have sent you to use all premium functions.

php_version_outdated.title: This PHP version is no longer supported
php_version_outdated.information: Your current PHP version ({{ version }}) is no longer supported by Buttonizer as it will no longer receive security patches. Some features will not work. We recommend upgrading to the latest version.

warnings.unsaved_changes: Are you sure you want to exit? Your changes have not been saved.

utils.visit_knowledgebase: Need help? Visit our knowledge base!
utils.code_copied: The code has been copied to your clipboard.

icon_selector.title: Icon selector
icon_selector.searching_for: Searching for: <bold>{{ keyword }}</bold>, found <bold>{{ resultCount }}</bold> results.

crash.title: Buttonizer has crashed!
crash.subtitle: Our development team has been notified.
crash.subtitle2: If you'd like to help, tell us what happened below.
crash.no_super_intro: We're sorry, Buttonizer has crashed! Would you like to become a SUPER contributor and automatically log errors, including this one?
crash.no_super_additional_info: By sharing your crash report with us, you will help us detect exceptions like these so we can resolve them in a future release.

utils.knowledge_link: Need help? Learn how to use <bold>{{ setting }}</bold>.

time_schedule.question: Are you very sure you want to remove this time schedule? Buttons that are still attached to this time schedule will become visible unless you attach them to another time schedule or hide them.
time_schedule.no_buttons: There are no buttons attached to this time schedule. You can remove this safely.
time_schedule.num_buttons_multiple: There are <bold>{{ buttonCount }}</bold> buttons attached to this time schedule!
time_schedule.num_buttons_single: There is <bold>1</bold> button attached to this time schedule
time_schedule.last_warning: Do you want to remove this time schedule?

button.question: Are you sure you want to remove this button?
button.question_remove: Are you sure you want to remove the button called '{{ name }}'?
button.cannot_delete: You cannot delete this button because this the only button left.

group.question: Are you sure you want to remove this group?
group.question_multiple_buttons: Are you sure you want to remove this full group? It contains {{ count }} buttons.
group.cannot_delete: You cannot delete this group because this the only group left.

page_rule.question: Are you very sure you want to remove this page rule? Buttons that are still attached to this page rule will become visible unless you attach them to another page rule or hide them.
page_rule.no_buttons: There are no buttons attached to this page rule. You can remove this safely.
page_rule.num_buttons_multiple: There are <bold>{{ buttonCount }}</bold> buttons attached to this page rule!
page_rule.num_buttons_single: There is <bold>1</bold> button attached to this page rule
page_rule.last_warning: Do you want to remove this page rule?

remove.permanent: This action is permanent and cannot be undone.

modal.intro: Are you sure you want to revert your changes?
modal.action: The current changes will be overwritten by the current published buttons and settings.

error.title: Could not revert settings
error.message: Something went wrong while reverting your settings.

welcome.title: Thanks for using Buttonizer!
welcome.intro: We are pleased to welcome you to Buttonizer 2.0!
welcome.super-contributor: Become a SUPER contributor by automatically sending us crash reports and error logs. This way we can bugfix your bugs with the speed of light. Don't worry, all data is anonymized.
welcome.tour: We've created a tour for our new Buzzers. Would you like to take the tour?
welcome.already_know: No thanks, I know how it works

buttonizer_tour.tour_disabled: Pick a button to start the tour
buttonizer_tour.intro_interface_tour: We've created a tour for our new Buzzers. Would you like to take the tour? If not, feel free to watch a tour whenever you want. You can find all of our tours in the <bold>settings</bold> of Buttonizer.
buttonizer_tour.intro_new_features_tour: Keep up-to-date with the newest releases, feature updates, and news from Buttonizer by following this short tour. Do not worry if you can not follow it right now! You can find this tour in the <bold>settings</bold> of Buttonizer.

step_0.title: Groups contains buttons
step_0.intro: A group can have multiple buttons that work separately from each other. Click on “Add button” to add more buttons to this group.

step_1.title: Group settings
step_1.intro: You can change the styling for every buttons in this group. Changing the same setting in the button settings will override the group settings.

step_2.title: General
step_2.intro: The general settings control some basic configuration for your button. You can change the label, position and style of the group here. Make sure the label is short and clear.

step_3.title: Styling
step_3.intro: Customize your button, icon and label. You can set a different style for the normal and hover state of some settings. Click on the back icon to the right side of the setting to make it go back to the default value.

step_4.title: Navigation
step_4.intro: This button makes navigation between the different buttons easier. You can also go to the group’s settings.

step_5.title: Preferences
step_5.intro: Click here to open the settings page.

step_6.title: Publish
step_6.intro: Adjustments are automatically saved in the editor and will not be shown on the site. Make sure to click "Publish" to see these changes on your website.

step_7.title: More Buttonizer Tours
step_7.intro: We have more tours in store which are more in-depth and will help you improve your experience with Buttonizer even more. Go to settings to enjoy another tour!

step_8.title: Support
step_8.intro: Our support helps you troubleshoot common issues, find solutions, ask questions, and share tips with other Buzzers.

step_0.title: New button
step_0.intro: If you would like to have a single Floating Action Button that triggers a primary action, then we would advise you to create a single button.

step_1.title: Settings for button
step_1.intro: Click here to go to the settings of the button to view the different configurations.

step_2.title: General
step_2.intro: The general settings control some basic configuration for your button. You can change the action type and the label of the button here.

step_3.title: Button action
step_3.intro: The Button action in the general settings specify where to send your website visitors too once you have added an action to the button.

step_5.title: Device visibility
step_5.intro: You can decide if your button should be available on mobile devices and/ or on computers.

step_6.title: Label text
step_6.intro: You can add and change the text of the label here. Choose a label that is short and clear.

step_7.title: Style your button
step_7.intro: If you want to change the colors of your button, then you can go to the tab Style and you will see that the first settings are the color settings for your button.

step_8.title: Normal vs hover
step_8.intro: You can set a different button style for the normal and hover state.

step_11.title: Icon
step_11.intro: Learn how to add a Font Awesome icon to your button.

step_12.title: Icon vs image
step_12.intro: Your floating action button can contain an icon that promotes a primary action. You can either select an icon in Buttonizer or import your own image.

step_13.title: Select icon
step_13.intro: Pick an icon you would like to see in your button.

step_14.title: Icon size
step_14.intro: Change the size of your button icons. Increase or decrease the size of icons relative to that inherited font-size.

step_15.title: Label visibility
step_15.intro: You can decide if the label next to the button should be available on mobile devices,  computers or on both.

step_16.title: Label position
step_16.intro: With label position you can place the label on either side of the button. You can make use of this feature right away to see which position you prefer.

step_17.title: Font family
step_17.intro: Choosing the right font is an important step in making your button usable and accessible. Buttonizer automatically grabs the font family from your website, but you can also use the complete set of properties to choose the right font family.

step_18.title: Margin
step_18.intro: With margin you can create more space around your button. Try it out by using pixels or percentages.

step_19.title: Padding
step_19.intro: With padding you can control the space between its content and its border. Try it out by using pixels or percentages.

import.title: Import
import.select_please: Please select a Buttonizer export file.
import.select_click: Click or drop a JSON export file

into_group.text: Import buttons or replace this group.

warning.replace: You are about to replace this group with:

warning.no_buttons: This group does not have any buttons to import.

warning.preview: What you are about to export:
warning.no_buttons: This group does not have any buttons to export.
warning.no_data: This button does not have any data to export.

settings.tippy_single_button: Add button to enable group settings

background_color.title: Button color
background_color.description: This is the color of your button group and also the default color for your buttons within this group.

label_same_width.title: Make all labels have same width

label_same_height.title: Set height same as the button's

background_image.title: Use background image
background_image.description: Upload an image if you want an image as a background instead of a color. Recommended aspect ratio: square (1:1).

border_radius.title: Border radius
border_radius.description: Change the roundness of this button group.

box_shadow.title: Box shadow
box_shadow.description: Change the box shadow of this button.

margin.title: Margin
margin.description: Change the position of the label.

padding.title: Padding
padding.description: Change the background size of the label.

icon.title: Icon
icon.description: Choose an icon from the icon library.

icon_color.title: Icon color
icon_color.description: Change the icon color of this button.

icon_image_border_radius.title: Border radius
icon_image_border_radius.description: Change the border radius of the image.

icon_image_select.title: Icon
icon_image_select.description: You can also use a free image uploader like imgbb.com.

icon_image_size.title: Image size
icon_image_size.description: Change the size of the image.

icon_or_image.title: Graphic
icon_or_image.label: Select icon type
icon_or_image.description: Choose whether to use an icon or image as the button icon.

icon_size.title: Icon size
icon_size.description: Change the icon size of this button.

label.title: Label
label.description: Change the label of this button.

label_color.title: Text color
label_color.description: Change the text and background color of the label for this button or group.

font_size_border_radius.title: Font size & border radius
font_size_border_radius.description: Change the font size and border radius of the label for this button group.

menu_animation.title: Animation
menu_animation.description: This will animate this button group to get the attention of the visitor. The animation repeats itself every 10 seconds.

label_position.title: Position
label_position.warning: Make sure to add a label

menu_position.title: Position
menu_position.description: Change the position of this button group.

menu_style.title: Menu style
menu_style.description: Change the menu style of this button group.
menu_style.warning: This setting is not used when using the {{ name }} menu style...

menu.title: Menu
menu.description: Turn on or off whether the group has a closable menu button

opening_animation.title: Opening animation
opening_animation.description: Decide what type of opening animation is used for opening/closing the menu

label_desktop.title: Visibility
label_desktop.description: Always show the label, show the label on hover or hide the label on <u>desktop devices</u>.

label_mobile.title: Visibility
label_mobile.description: Always show or hide the label on <u>mobile devices</u>.

show_mobile_desktop.title: Show on
show_mobile_desktop.description: Choose if you want to make this button group visible on desktop and mobile devices.

start_opened.title: Start opened
start_opened.description: This button group starts opened when this setting is enabled.

use_main_button_style.title: Use group style
use_main_button_style.description: When enabled, this button will use the same style as the button group.
use_main_button_style.warning: Disable USE GROUP STYLE to access these settings

close_on_click_outside.title: Close on click outside
close_on_click_outside.description: This will close the menu if you click outside Buttonizer.

close_on_click_inside.title: Close on button click
close_on_click_inside.description: This will close the menu if you click on a button inside this group.

open_on_mouseover.title: Open on hover
open_on_mouseover.description: This will open the menu if you hover the group button.

close_on_mouseout.title: Close on mouse out
close_on_mouseout.description: This will close the menu if you hover out the group button.

custom_id.title: Custom ID
custom_id.description: Adds a custom 'id' HTML attribute to the button.
custom_id.pro_description: You can add a custom ID to each button for styling purposes.

custom_class.title: Custom class
custom_class.description: Adds a custom 'class' HTML attribute to the button.
custom_class.pro_description: You can add a custom class to each button for styling purposes.

selected_page_rule.title: Page rule
selected_page_rule.description: Adds a custom 'class' HTML attribute to the button.
selected_page_rule.pro_description: You can add a custom class to each button for styling purposes.
selected_page_rule.cannot_select: You cannot select the same page rule as it's group!

show_on_rule_trigger.show: Show button when rule is triggered
show_on_rule_trigger.hide: Hide button when rule is triggered

scroll.title: Scroll
scroll.info: Scroll <bold>{{ scrollValue }}</bold> from top of page to <bold>{{ showOrHide }}</bold> group

exit_intent.title: Exit intent
exit_intent.pro_description: With this setting, you can trigger Buttonizer to animate before your guest exits your website.
exit_intent.description: Exit intent can be used to trigger an animation around Buttonizer when a visitor is leaving your website.
exit_intent.info: Please note: Exit intent will not trigger in preview mode, only in your LIVE website.

how_often._title: How often should it be triggered?

popups.elementor_guide: Copy and paste this into your Elementor Popup's "Open By Selector" option.
popups.popup_maker_guide: In your Popup Settings, add a new "Click to Open" trigger and copy and paste this code in "Extra CSS Selectors"

button_action.title: Button action
button_action.description: Choose a click action for this button.

actions.add_request: Can't find a suitable action request?

phone_number.name: Call action (phone number)
phone_number.invalid: Check your phone number, it should look like this: +00123456789

page.name: Page
page.helper: To visualise what page type you have chosen, the value is displayed as: '[Page type]: [Page name]'.

actions.viber: Viber does not support a "chat with phone number " link. When a user clicks on this button it will open their "add contact" with the number filled in.

messenger_chat.description: Facebook Messenger Chat Widget! First, you'll need to <howToLink>whitelist</howToLink> your site on Facebook. Then add your <helpLink>Page ID</helpLink> into the input above.

actions.poptin:
You need to install Poptin's WordPress plugin.
You can find it here.
Once you've made a Poptin paste the direct link into the input above.

download.name: Download file
download.description: Enter the full URL of the file that should be downloaded by the browser when the button is clicked. The file can be of any file format, but must be publicly accessible.

actions.action_discontinued: {{ action }} has been discontinued and replaced with {{ replacement }}.

url.name: Website URL
url.invalid: This URL appears to be invalid. The button may not work as expected.
url.invalid_tip: Do you miss http:// or https://? Perhaps an unnecessary space is added somewhere.
url.insecure: Insecure URL: Sorry to interrupt, but we advice you to use HTTPS for your URLS. This is a safer way to transport data.

javascript.name: Custom button action / JavaScript
javascript.editor_deprecated: The button JavaScript editor has been deprecated in favour of our JavaScript API. Please update your code. Learn more.
javascript.editor_deprecated_action: Have you moved your JavaScript code? Click here to remove the deprecated code.
javascript.warning_intro: You are changing this button action from custom javascript to a different action. Your javascript changes will be lost.
javascript.warning_question: Are you sure you want to proceed?
javascript.intro_text: With our advanced JavaScript API we have multiple events available which you can use to interact with groups and buttons.
javascript.snippet: Add the following JavaScript code snippet to your website to use JavaScript with this button:

actions.whatsapp_info: Fill in your phone number without any spaces and symbols. Read WhatsApps recommendations by clicking here.
actions.twitter_info: When you want to use Twitter DM you will need to find your Twitter User ID and allow direct messages from anyone. To find your account ID <findAccountLink>click here</findAccountLink>. And to read more about how to allow direct messages from anyone, <allowDirectMessagesLink>click here</allowDirectMessagesLink>.
actions.signal_group_info: Paste the generated Signal group URL into the field. If you need more information about how to enable group invite links, click here.

icon_library.title: Icon library
icon_library.info: If your theme automatically loads in a library, just select the correct icon library instead.

select_version.title: Select version
select_version.info: Select the correct version of the library in order to use the icons in Buttonizer.

library_license_key.info: You have selected an icon library that has premium icons. Enter the library license code to view and use these.

import_library.title: Import icon library
import_library.info: Should Buttonizer import the icon library into your theme? If your theme already imports the library you can disable this.

google_analytics.title: Google Analytics
google_analytics.intro: When enabled, Buttonizer will automatically log clicks to your Google Analytics account. You can force Buttonizer not to use the Google Analytics by disabling this switch.
google_analytics.tracking_code_info: Google Analytics is automatically detected if you have added it to your webpage. But, if you don't make use of Google Analytics yet and  this is your first time, Buttonizer can add it for you.
google_analytics.tracking_code_warning: If you have added Google Analytics to your webpage before and Buttonizer also adds the same Analytics code, it will mess with your analytics data!
google_analytics.link: Where can I see my click data of my buttons in Google Analytics?

admin_button.title: Show admin top bar
admin_button.info: Hide Buttonizer in the admin top bar by disabling this setting.

tooltips.title: Show tooltips
tooltips.info: Hide the tooltips by disabling this setting.

tips.title: Show Buttonizer tips
tips.info: Hide the Buttonizer tips in the dashboard by disabling this setting

subdomain.title: Subdomain support
subdomain.info: Some WordPress websites use subdomains for content purposes. Enable this setting to allow Buttonizer to load on your subdomains. Only enable this when you need it.

ajax.title: Use ajax on to load the buttons
ajax.info: This feature has been created to make sure Buttonizer doesn't slow down your website. If you'd like to show the buttons immediately without loadtime, disable this setting. The load impect will depend on the amount of buttons and groups you currently have.

error_logging.title: Automatic error logging and crash reporting
error_logging.info: Enable automatic error logging and crash reporting in order to help us solve issues within Buttonizer! All data is anonymized automatically.

no_limit.title: Show more than 7 buttons in a group!
no_limit.info: When enabled, it will disable the 7 button limit in Buttonizer. This means that you will be able to add as much buttons you can fit in the screen!

reset_opt_in.title: Opt-in to Buttonizer
reset_opt_in.info: Currently you are opted out for sharing your WordPress environment information. When you want to make use of Buttonizer Pro, you need to opt-in. For more information, check out the opt-in page.

additional_roles.title: Permissions
additional_roles.info: You can grant more roles to access the Buttonizer settings who are not an administrator.

interface.title: Buttonizer interface
interface.description: Make a tour through Buttonizer's interface

create_button.title: Create a button
create_button.description: Learn how to make floating action buttons

first_feature.title: New styling options!
first_feature.info: We've added much more styling options for the group and the buttons. Now you can truly customize the buttons to your liking.

second_feature.title: Load in templates
second_feature.info: Instead of creating your own buttons and groups, you can save time by loading ready-made templates. Click "add button" or "create new group" to see all templates available.

third_feature.title: Updated menu position for button styles
third_feature.info: We have slightly adjusted the placement of the settings for changing the button position. Don't worry, you can still find the settings under the "Advanced" tab.

fourth_feature.title: "Shift + click" to skip a dialog
fourth_feature.info: You can now press shift + click when adding, deleting and duplicating to skip the confirmation dialog.

reset.title: Reset Buttonizer
reset.description: If you need a clean install
reset.info: This is a way to reset Buttonizer to the default settings.

what_will_happen.title: What will happen when I click the red button below?
what_will_happen.info: The plugin will get a 'factory reset'. All settings of Buttonizer will get deleted, reverting back to when you first installed and activated Buttonizer.

why.title: Why would I do that?
why.info: Perhaps you ruined your buttons, categories or settings and would like to start from scratch. Or maybe you just feel trying the reset button...

license.title: I have a license, what about that?
license.info: No worries! Nothing will happen with your license! It only resets the following:

default_settings.title: Okay, sounds good. What then?
default_settings.info: Buttonizer will revert back to the default settings and feel like a fresh installation. That's all.

ready.title: Okay, I'm ready!
ready.info: Press the red button below to reset Buttonizer. There will be no more warnings.

bar.menu_button: The button to open/close the group. Show or hide it on prefered devices.

preview.no_changes: You probably have clicked a link, this made you leave the preview window of Buttonizer. You cannot see your changes here.

knowledgebase.title: Knowledge base
knowledgebase.description: Find out everything you need to know about Buttonizer

support.title: I need support
support.description: Direct support with the Buttonizer developers

menu.follow: Follow us for useful tips & tricks!

account.title: My Account
account.description: View your license and account details

upgrade.title: Upgrade or pricing
upgrade.description: A deep dive in all the possibilities

buttons.tippy_new_group: This creates a new group with 2 buttons inside.
buttons.tippy_single_button: This creates a new button, outside other groups.
buttons.tippy_learn_more: Learn more about groups and buttons
buttons.tippy_drag_warning: You can't drag the only button left in a group!

migration_modal.title: Hi Buttonizer!
migration_modal.intro: It appears you've installed Buttonizer 2.0 before. But, you installed version 1.5 again later on and updated back to 2.0!
migration_modal.convert: The migration progress did not run as it did back then. In order to convert your buttons, press the button below!
migration_modal.popping_up: If this window keeps popping up, even when you've tried to convert the buttons, try to reset Buttonizer. Go to the 'cog' icon () on the top bar, select 'Options ' and the tab 'Reset' and follow the instructions.

modal.title: Premium feature
modal.describe: Hi! You’re trying to access a premium feature. To try this and other amazing features, you can upgrade your account.
modal.credentials: 14-Day Money Back Guarantee For New Purchases​

list.button_sizes: Change the size of the buttons and groups
list.time_schedules: Show button(groups) using the advanced time schedules
list.page_rules: Show button(groups) on specific pages using advanced page rules
list.custom_images: Custom button background and icon image
list.custom_class: Be able to set CSS class names and button IDs

premium.warning_duplicate: Duplicating buttons is disabled for free version

menu_styles.text: This menu style will remove the icon and add the label into the button, making it one long button.
menu_styles.text-icon: This menu style will add the label into the button with an icon, making it one long button.

premium.multiple_button_groups: You are able to add multiple groups on different positions
premium.custom_image: You can select images and set them as icon or as button background image.
premium.show_on_timeout: With this setting, you can make your button appear/hide after certain amount of time.
premium.show_on_scroll: With this setting, you can make your button appear/hide after scrolling for a certain amount.
premium.add_animation_settings: With this setting, you can change your animation settings like delay and repeat count.
premium.font_family: With this setting, you can change the font family of the label. You choose a font add your custom font.
premium.margin: With this setting, you can change the margin of the label. Change the position of the label relative to it's button
premium.padding: With this setting, you can change the size of the label.

page_rules.name: Page rules
page_rules.menu_description: Choose on which page you want to show a button (group)
page_rules.window_description: You can setup page rules via this window. When you add pages or definitions to this page rule, the buttons attached to this page rule will be shown or hidden depending on their settings as soon this rule is triggered.
page_rules.pro_description: You can setup page rules that will get triggered on specific pages or user roles. You can create unlimited page rules with multiple rules to trigger.
page_rules.input_any_page: Show the button on any page
page_rules.trigger: Triggers when ONE of the selected values is true
page_rules.delete_group: Deleting this condition group will delete all of your conditions within this group. Would you like to proceed?

conditions.title: Conditions
conditions.show_group_on: Show group when this page rule is activated
conditions.hide_group_on: Hide group when this page rule is activated
conditions.show_button_on: Show button when this page rule is activated
conditions.hide_button_on: Hide button when this page rule is activated

empty.rules: There are no rules for this condition group. It will be triggered by default.
empty.groups: There are no conditions for this page rule. It will be triggered by default.

types.one_meets: One or more conditions must be met (OR)
types.must_meet_group: All condition groups must be met (AND)
types.one_meets_group: One or more condition groups must be met (OR)

debug.title: Debug
debug.invalid: This URL appears to be invalid. You need to use the whole URL of your page.
debug.example: It should look something like {{ url }}
debug.not_triggered: This Page Rule is not triggered
debug.one_met: One or more conditions were met
debug.one_met_group: One or more condition groups were met
debug.one_not_met: One or more conditions were not met
debug.one_not_met_group: One or more condition groups were not met
debug.all_not_met_group: All condition groups were not met

page_rules.remove_rule: Are you sure you want to remove this rule?
page_rules.remove_rule_aborted: Aborted. Each page rule must keep at least one rule.
page_rules.warning_changing_rule: You still have selected values, are you sure you want to remove this?

time_schedules.name: Time schedules
time_schedules.menu_description: For example: Show a call me now button only on opening times
time_schedules.pro_description: You can setup time schedules that will get triggered during specific times of a day. It is even possible to change the schedule actions for specific days. You can create an unlimited amount of schedules.
time_schedules.show_any_time: Show the button at any time

conditions.show_group_on: Show group when this time schedule is activated
conditions.hide_group_on: Hide group when this time schedule is activated
conditions.show_button_on: Show button when this time schedule is activated
conditions.hide_button_on: Hide button when this time schedule is activated

time_schedules.must_keep_one: You must keep at least one schedule

remove_date.title: Remove date
remove_date.message: Are you sure you want to remove this date?

errors.time_invalid: Sorry, the time '{{ value }}' was invalid. Reverting back to '{{ originalValue }}'.
errors.time_overlap_start: The start time '{{ startValue }}' conflicts with the end time '{{ endValue }}'. Time has been reverted to '{{ originalValue }}'. Make sure you have at least 5 minutes overlap.
errors.time_overlap_end: The end time '{{ endValue }}' conflicts with the start time '{{ startValue }}'. Time has been reverted to '{{ originalValue }}'. Make sure you have at least 5 minutes overlap.

exclude.title: Excluded Dates
exclude.info: Add specific dates to show or hide the buttons attached to this time scheme. For example: "My store is open on January 22th until 22:00 (10 PM) because of some special evening we organize." The rule will overwrite the default settings for that day.

input_start.label: Start triggering buttons from
input_start.error: Warning! Your start date '{{ date }}' hast past the end date of this schedule. If you do not change this date the schedule will not work.

input_end.label: Stop triggering buttons after (optional)
input_end.placeholder_empty: Select a date in the datepicker below
input_end.error: Warning! Your end date '{{ date }}' has past the start date of this schedule. If you do not change this date the schedule will not work.

random_tips.tip_1: Did you know that Buttonizer has different group-styles you can use?
random_tips.tip_2: Click on the buttons to manage their settings
random_tips.tip_4: A button can only have one action, but you can choose out more than 25 actions!
random_tips.tip_5: Turn off these tips in settings
random_tips.tip_6: You can show more than 7 buttons by enabling it in Preferences ;)
random_tips.tip_7: Paste the HEX-code in the colorpicker if you want to use a specific color
random_tips.tip_8: Playing smart with 'Show on desktop' and 'Show on mobile' will give you up to 14 buttons per page!
random_tips.tip_9: You can use Page Rules to show or hide buttons on certain pages
random_tips.tip_10: You can use the social share button action to let a visitor share your webpage
random_tips.tip_12: You can style the main big button by editting the group
random_tips.tip_13: You can add a class or id HTML-attribute to a group and a button
random_tips.tip_14: Want to make a new similar button? Duplicate your button!
random_tips.tip_15: If you have a great tip, let us know! We'll add it :)
random_tips.tip_16: Pssst, click on the group/button name on top
random_tips.tip_17: Exit Intent... This is where the fun begins!
random_tips.tip_18: With our brand new color picker you can build a personalized palette, create a color scale and blend colors
random_tips.tip_19: Premium users just need one license key for their production environment and development environment
random_tips.tip_20: Give more roles permission to access Buttonizer's dashboard in Preferences!
random_tips.tip_21: Easily edit a specific button by hovering on them on the preview
random_tips.tip_22: Add a custom text when using Social Sharing actions!
random_tips.tip_23: Buttonizer also supports languages that are written from right-to-left :)
